A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was an incredible Star Wars film. I think we have to go in without expectations\, and too many people went in wanting to to be what they expected. I don't really understand why people say it expands the ideas of the force or the Jedi\, I just believe it was an incredibly well told character journey for these heroes. I do with that there was a little back story for Snoke and I'm not sure I believe that Rey's background is what we saw\, after all\, there is a \"certain point of view\" to consider. I think the full value of this trilogy will not be evident until the final piece is in place.
